mapper.select: select c.no, cm.role AS role, c.status AS crewStatus, -- 필드명이 중복되지 않도록 별칭 지정 cm.status AS memberStatus, -- 필드명이 중복되지 않도록 별칭 지정 cm.createdAt, cm.updatedAt, c.name, c.city, c.district, c.runningDay from crewmembers as cm left join crews AS c ON cm.crewNo = c.no where cm.userNo = #{userNo}

select crewmembers.crewNO, crews.name, crewmembers.userNo, users.nickName, crewmembers.role, crewmembers.status, DATE_FORMAT(crewmembers.createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d') AS createdAt, crews.no, crews.status from crewmembers left join crews on crewmembers.crewNO = crews.no left join users on crewmembers.userNO = users.no where crewNo in (select crewNo from crewmembers where userNo=${param1} and role = 'leader') and crews.no = crewmembers.crewNo ;
